experience.description: As a Lead Application Engineer, I spearheaded the design and development of data-driven full-stack web applications, collaborating closely with data scientists and analysts to turn insights into scalable products. I played a key role in choosing the right tech stack, setting up cloud infrastructure, and overseeing end-to-end deployment. In addition to hands-on coding, I led project planning, distributed tasks among peers, and ensured timely, high-quality delivery while maintaining close communication with clients to align technical solutions with business needs.
bullets: Leading Multiple Web Applications Development, Design and Deployment
